DOC.brief_summary: Patients hypogastric artery and/or uterine artery ligate evaluated term ovarian reserve marker anti-mullerian hormone level , ovarian volume , antral follicule count , follicule stimuli hormone estrogen level . Investigators search archive find suitable patient study . Investigators especially notice least 6 month time interval surgery evaluation time . Ultrasound examination take blood sample perform 2nd 3th day menstrual cycle . These result compare normal postpartum woman 's result . It evaluate effect hypogastric artery and/or uterine artery ovarian reserve
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Ovarian Reserve Patients Who Hypogastric Arteries Uterine Arteries Had Been Ligated
DOC.criteria: Patients ligate hypogastric and/or uterine artery Patients 6 month period surgery Without perform hysterectomy No old 40 year old No history endocrinopathy effect upon ovarian reserve Patients make gynecologic surgery fallopian tube ligation hysterectomy etc . Patients older 40 year old Patients use drug effect upon ovarian reserve Patients diseases effect upon ovarian reserve endocrinopathy , malign disease require radiotherapy chemotherapy etc .
